subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Former champions are flocking to coach today’s tennis stars like never before, including Boris Becker joining Novak Djokovic’s team and Roger Federer hiring Stefan Edberg.
snippet: Former champions are flocking to coach today’s tennis stars like never before, including Boris Becker joining Novak Djokovic’s team and Roger Federer hiring Stefan Edberg.
